entities.name: the burrow
entities.description: The main residence of the Weasley family.

entities.name: clock
entities.description: A clock on the wall with only one hand and no numbers.

entities.name: books
entities.description: Books stacked three deep on the mantelpiece with titles like Charm Your Own Cheese and Enchantment in Baking.

entities.name: radio
entities.description: An old radio next to the sink that announced Celestina Warbeck's show.

entities.name: Mrs Weasley
entities.description: Harry's mother figure and a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: Arthur
entities.description: Mr. Weasley, Harry's father figure and a member of the Weasley family.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story.

entities.name: Celestina Warbeck
entities.description: A popular singing sorceress mentioned on the radio.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley assured Harry that she didn't blame him for something.
